entry.title: Bitcoin Inventor's Controversial Identity Resurfaces in New HBO Documentary
entry.summary: A new HBO documentary claimed to have uncovered the identity of Bitcoin creator Satoshi Nakamoto. However, the man identified as the mysterious figure behind the leading cryptocurrency has denied the claims, BBC reported. Titled "Money Electric: The Bitcoin Mystery," the documentary identified Canadian crypto expert Peter Todd as the elusive inventor. However, Todd swiftly dismissed these assertions. Who is Satoshi Nakamoto? In a dramatic confrontation within the documentary, filmmaker Cullen Hoback presents evidence suggesting Todd's connection to Satoshi. Todd, a well-known figure in the Bitcoin community credited with numerous innovations, reportedly refuted the claims, stating that he is not Satoshi Nakamoto. He publicly dismissed the suggestion, asserting that H‚Ä¶

entry.title: XRP ETF Round 2: Canary Capital‚Äôs Latest Move In The US Market
entry.summary:
Crypto investment company Canary Capital has submitted an application for a second XRP exchange-traded fund (ETF) in the United States. This filing is consistent with Bitwise‚Äôs recent submission of a comparable application for a spot XRP ETF.
In light of the legal and regulatory uncertainty surrounding XRP, Canary‚Äôs decision to proceed with this ETF demonstrates a bold approach to the asset‚Äôs long-term potential.
Canary Capital submitted the S-1 filing Tuesday, which is a requirement for issuers to file to publicly offer new securities.
The Canary ETF is particularly ambitious as the legal and regulatory fate of XRP remains shrouded in doubt, indicating a firm conviction in the digital asset‚Äôs future role in the finance industry.

entry.title: Tether Celebrates 10 Years: CEO Paolo Ardoino Details Plans For The Future
entry.summary:
On Sunday, Tether, the issuing company behind the largest and most widely used stablecoin on the market USDT, marked a significant turning point by celebrating its 10th anniversary.¬†
In a recent interview with FOX Business, Tether‚Äôs CEO Paolo Ardoino addressed widespread criticism of the company‚Äôs alleged lack of transparency regarding its reserves and recent achievements and plans.
Tether‚Äôs Surveillance Task Force
Ardoino, who stepped into the CEO role in 2023 after serving as the company‚Äôs chief technology officer for six years, outlined Tether‚Äôs strategies for revitalizing its brand in the coming months.¬†
These efforts include forming partnerships with US law enforcement agencies and enhancing its collaboration with broker-dealer Cantor Fitzgerald and its CEO, Howard Lutnick.¬† ‚Ä¶

entry.title: Toncoin (TON) Holders Cross 100 Million As Adoption Explodes 2,225%
entry.summary:
On-chain data shows the number of Toncoin holders has crossed the 100 million milestone following an acceleration in TON adoption.
Toncoin Holders Have Exploded 2,225% Since Start Of 2024
As explained by CryptoQuant community manager Maartunn in a new Quicktake post, the TON network has recently set a new record. The on-chain¬†relevance metric here is the¬†Holder Count, which measures the total number of addresses on a given blockchain that is currently carrying a non-zero balance.
When the value of this indicator rises, it means a net amount of unique addresses with a balance are showing up on the network. This could happen due to new users or old ones who sold before returning to the asset.
Existing investors also naturally contribute to the trend by opening up new addresses for ‚Ä¶

entry.summary: Muinmos, a Danish RegTech firm, and cryptocurrency firm XBO.com partnered to improve how crypto exchanges onboard users. Automating Compliance XBO.com's integration of Muinmos' software-as-a-service platform aims to improve users' experiences while strengthening the exchange's risk management capabilities. According to a statement shared with Finance Magnates, Muinmos aims to enhance the platform's ability to monitor transactions and detect suspicious activities by automating Know Your Customer (KYC) processes, performing real-time client classification, and conducting continuous risk assessments. entry.summary: BTC ETFs see inflows for 8 straight days. SUI enters top 20, $110m of unlocks today. SOL weekly DEX volume flips ETH. Firedancer sees very fast TPS on Testnet. ETH gas up 500% in 2 weeks. EIGEN opens at $7bn FDV. FTX creditors vote in favour of restructuring plan. Dell to sell another $1.2bn Dell stock. Metaplanet buys another 107 BTC.Grayscale opens decentralised AI fund to investors. Robinhood allows crypto transfer in EU. Pollak to head Coinbase Wallet & join exec team. Gemini to close in Canada. Japan considers lower cap gains tax on crypto. Ohio bill would make it legal to pay taxes in crypto. Trump project opens whitelist to non-US users. CZ pledges to invest in blockchain companies.

entry.title: Binance CEO Richard Teng Talks Progress on Exchange's Global Regulatory Goals
entry.summary: Decrypt Reporters Sander Lutz and Liz Napolitano spoke with Binance CEO Richard Teng about the crypto exchange's progress on establishing a global headquarters, improving its relationships with regulators, and expanding its global presence in the wake of founder Changpeng "CZ" Zhao's jailing in the U.S.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 207 - WELCOME BACK TO THE BULL!
entry.summary: Kamala signals support for crypto. Top memecoins all soar, add $10bn in value in a week. MOODENG hits $180m, does 11x in a week. SUI & SEI continue to lead L1s for price & TVL growth. Revolut & Robinhood are considering stablecoin. Visa launches new tokenisation platform for banks. PayPal to allow business accounts to hold crypto Hamster kombat's HMSTER disappoints on launch. Biden admin may have forced Silvergate‚Äôs closure. Court rules crypto mining boxes ‚Äòare securities‚Äô.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 206 - MEMES ARE PUMPING!
entry.summary: BTC nears $65k key resistance level. Kamala makes positive comments about crypto. PayPal allows businesses to hold crypto. Visa allows banks to test RWAs & smart contracts. Cuban wants to be head of SEC. Silvergate claims about ‚ÄòChokepoint 2.0‚Äô grow. Truflation hacked for $5m. Telegram Wallet blocked in UK & US. Court rules crypto mining boxes are securities. Infinex DeFi platform raises $65m. Ethena announces new stablecoin linked to BUIDL.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 205 - ALTCOINS CONTINUE TO RALLY!
entry.summary: SUI leads L1 gains as TVL crosses $1bn. Altcoin market cap close to breaking downtrend. SEI becomes top chain for 1 month TVL growth. ETH ETFs sees 3rd largest inflow ever. SEC delays ETH ETF options decision. SOL took most of ETH outflows over last 3 months. SOLETH continues to be trading at resistance. $8.1bn BTC options to expire this week. BTC heading to $500k-$1m in a year: PlanB. Stablecoin supply hits new ATH. Caroline Ellison sentenced to 2 years in jail. SBF & Diddy in the same jail. SEC settles against TUSD for not being collateralised. Gensler gets derided for crypto approach. Hester Pierce admits flaws in SEC crypto policy. Harris against regulation by litigation: Cuban. Golem claims ETH move to CEXs due to staking. Binance refutes data leak claims. Next Y combinator batch has ‚Äòno crypto companies‚Äô. Celo overtakes Tron for stablecoin addresses.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 204 - MOODENG MOO-NING!
entry.summary: BTC needs to top $65.2k to put in a higher high. ETH ETFs see biggest outflow since July. ETH outperformance could be start of ‚Äòalt season‚Äô. BlackRock gets 12hr BTC withdrawal from Coinbase. cbBTC only wrapped BTC to not show reserves. Telegram to share user data upon legal requests. EIGEN non-transferability to be removed Sep 30th. TIA announces $100m funding round. TIA deal was OTC token sale ‚Äòdone months ago‚Äô. Polymarket considers token, trying $50m raise. Maybe we will pay off debt with crypto: Trump. Harris unlikely to give full crypto policy pre-election. 13m Binance users‚Äô data may have been leaked. Caroline Ellison likely won‚Äôt serve time in jail.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 203 - KAMALA GOES PRO-CRYPTO
entry.summary: Crypto funds saw $321m inflows last week. Kamala commits to crypto & AI expansion. TAO leads gains in AI hype, does 2x in 2 weeks. SUI TVL breaks $900m. Average Q4 returns for BTC is 88%. BTC Google searches down 75% since 2021. BTC 161 days from halving, when it rallied in 2020. Crypto VCs raised $2.2bn this year, well below 2021.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 202 - SOL STARTS TO SEND IT
entry.summary: SOL leads majors as Breakpoint begins. SOL launches Frankendancer on mainnet. Helio Pay allows Shopify items to sell on X. Franklin Templeton to launch fund on SOL. BTC short term holders fall at fastest rate in 12 years. MicroStrategy upsizes convertible note raise to $1bn. BingX loses $52m in hack. $243m crypto heist exposed by ZachXBT. Supreme Court of India hacked on X, shills scam. SocGen launches Euro stablecoin on SOL. Sky agrees to stop using WBTC. Germany shuts down 47 crypto exchanges. Stablecoin‚Äôs now 18th biggest holder of treasuries. Consensys lawsuit against SEC dismissed. Partisanship will stop Trump crypto plans: Hoskinson. Scaramucci working with Kamala on crypto.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 201 - CRYPTO FLYS AFTER FED
entry.summary: Crypto rips higher after Fed cuts 50bps. $22bn shorts would be liquidated by $70.5k. SUI continues to lead L1s, does 2.5x in a month. Trump buys burgers with Bitcoin. Bitcoin is hedge against US debt: BlackRock. Commerzbank to offer BTC & ETH trading. Solana unveils Seeker phone, $70m pre-orders Helius Labs raise $21.75m. WazirX hacker moves $32m ETH to Tornado cash. SEC made up crypto regulation ‚Äòout of thin air‚Äô. BitGo to launch stablecoin. Revolut considers creating stablecoin. Ethena front-end gets hacked, funds safe.
